alert.note: Alert for Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 22 at 3:19AM CST until February 22 at 6:00PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WEST TO SOUTHWEST WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES FOR MOST OF WEST CENTRAL TEXAS... The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a Red Flag Warning for strong west to southwest winds and low relative humidity values, which is in effect from 11 AM this morning to 6 PM CST this evening. * WINDS...West to southwest 20 to 30...gusts to near 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Dropping to 15 to 20 percent. * FUELS...Dry * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite will spread rapidly. Any outdoor activity that could result in flames or sparks is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will occur shortly. A combination of strong winds, low humidity and dry fuels will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
